title.rendered: Celly presents its new wireless chargers perfect for you

content.rendered:
Currently, Celly operates in more than 40 countries worldwide, with more than 3,000 points of sale. Now, its product catalog begins to land in Spain so you can buy its line of accessories at very moderate prices.

A renowned brand whose family of products has great prestige in the sector. Now, the company expands its range of mobile accessories with a wireless stand capable of charging a phone, smartwatch and headphones simultaneously, plus a kit that includes a wall and wireless charger so you don’t feel short of options.

Let’s take a closer look at the new wireless chargers that Celly has just launched on the Spanish market.

WLSTAND3IN1, the perfect wireless support for your gadgets

More and more users are betting on a smart watch as a techie accessory in their day to day. After overcoming the barriers of little autonomy offered by the first generations of smartwatches, now these wearables have become an inseparable companion. Y Celly has a perfect charging station for everyday use and that will allow you to charge all your gadgets comfortably and quickly.

We are talking about WLSTAND3IN1, the new wireless support that Celly has launched and that allows charging three devices simultaneously: phone, smartwatch and headphones.

With a minimalist design, as usual in the company’s products, this support offers a compact appearance and has three different charging slots. On the front, we see the space to place your smartphonewith a glossy finish to offer a more elegant appearance and help you place the phone more easily and comfortably.

Already in the upper part, there is the space to charge your smartwatch, with a soft-touch finish that prevents the watch from moving. Finally, on the back, this wireless charger has a space to charge your headphones, offering a rubber circle that prevents unwanted scratches on the headphones once placed.

All you have to do is connect the base to the power through its USB Type C port to enjoy this Celly WLSTAND3IN1 charger. Offers a Maximum charging speed of 15W for the phone, 5W for the headphones or up to 2.5W to charge your smartwatch. Its price? It costs only 59.99 euros.

MAGCHARGEKIT, a very complete two in one

As a second option we have a two in one of the most complete. We are talking about a kit with 20W mains adapter and a wireless charger magnetic so you don’t run out of options.

In this way, if you have a phone that does not offer wireless charging, you can use the traditional plug, in addition to charging other devices with wireless charging, they can enjoy the base that is included in this pack.

Regarding the network adapter, this charger with a USB Type C port allows you to charge devices up to a maximum of 20W. Highlight your power delivery technologycapable of detecting the device that is connected to deliver the maximum load supported and avoid possible damage.

On the other hand, the magnetic wireless charger has up to 10W of power for Android devices, or 7.5W for Apple terminals. Available in black and white, this two-in-one kit from Celly It has a recommended price of 39.99 euros.

As you may have seen, the two new chargers that Celly has launched cover all needs. Do you have an iPhone, Apple Watch and AirPods Pro? Bet on the WLSTAND3IN1 as it will more than meet expectations. Do you prefer a cheaper and more versatile version? Celly MAGCHARGEKIT will not disappoint you at all.
